subsection.name: Big Tasks
subsection.p: Port of the cache management code from C++ to new Java system.

tr.td: Live streams must be identified and when more than one client ask for the same live stream, the proxy must use the same server source, avoiding asking multiple time for the same resource.
The proxy should be able to work as a front-end for other RTSP servers.
The proxy should be able to work as a Unix daemon with script for start/stop in a linux/unix/mac environment, and as a NT service in windows.
If enabled only authorized user can access to proxy. A generic system should be used, allowing for interchanging different authorization back-ends.
Interface to monitor all proxy related parameters and to allow on-the-fly configuration modifications.
